name: Feed Your Dragons
description:
Feed Your Dragons is a game made for GoGodotJam. Jams theme was GROWTH

The idea for the game is to feed your dragons to make them happy. Grow grass to grow sheep population. You can feed sheeps to your dragons to make sure their happiness grows. 

Grasses make two seeds that you can pick up and plant to make more grass. Sheeps will eat grass. When sheep eats grass it will birth new sheep. You can pick up sheep to take its meat to dragon. Be wary if you drop your precious meat it will eventually spoil. Dragons will in time lose happiness so make sure to feed them.

Controls: 

Arrows - Movement
Enter - Interaction
Esc - Back to Menu
